short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show rating of posts and comments for authored users
short.ru: Отображает рейтинг постов и комментов для авторизованных пользователей

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension allow to show rating of posts and comments for loggedin users on several sites that supports JoyReactor CMS engine (https://app.assembla.com/spaces/empaty/subversion/source/HEAD)

Optional :

- Hide posts and comments by rating
- Highlight comments
